name: Domain of Forgery: Prayers Sung IV
description:
In times long gone, the Frostmoon Scions used this place as a sacrificial site, but naught now remains save boundless desolation.
Defeating the foes who lurk here may win you items that might be used to enhance your equipment.
disorder: DMG dealt by Bloom, Hyperbloom, and Burgeon reactions that characters trigger is increased by 150%. Lunar-Bloom reaction DMG is increased by 50%.
